name: The Abyss Of Souls
description:
You've died and gone to the afterlife. Your sins in life prevent you from ascending into heaven to enjoy eternal peace and happiness. The only option for you is to absolve your sins in the depths of the afterlife. Only once you are truely cleansed may you receive your reward.


Made in 7 days for 7drl 2017.


You can find the sources on github

You can find below 2 downloads. The original 7drl release and a big fix release. This bugfix changes the shader used as it was only compiling on some nvidia cards. No other changes are included.
